import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { saveNewRecipe } from '../../../actions/dashboard'; const AddRecipeForm = ({ saveNewRecipe }) => { const [formData, setFormdata] = useState({ title: '', subtitle: '', category: '', pt1: 'MALT/GRAIN BILL', pb1: '', pt2: 'HOPS/SCHEDULE', pb2: '', pt3: 'YEAST', pb3: '', pt4: 'DIRECTIONS', pb4: '' }) const { title, subtitle, category, pt1, pb1, pt2, pb2, pt3, pb3, pt4, pb4 } = formData; const onChange = (e) => { setFormdata({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: [e.target.value] }) }; const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('submit fired off') const packagedFormData = { title, subtitle, category, paragraphs: [ { title: pt1, body: pb1 }, { title: pt2, body: pb2 }, { title: pt3, body: pb3 }, { title: pt4, body: pb4 }, ] }; saveNewRecipe(packagedFormData); } return (
